CustomField.formula:
IMAGE('http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?cht=p3&chs=300x100&chd=t:'+ TEXT( Percent_Won__c ) + ',' + TEXT(1 - Percent_Won__c) + '&chco=236FBD&chl=Won ('+TEXT( ROUND(Percent_Won__c * 100, 0) )+'%)|Lost ('+TEXT(ROUND((1- Percent_Won__c) * 100, 0) )+'%)&chf=bg,s,FFFFFF'
, 'no data available')
CustomField.label: Win Loss Ratio
